title: Fordlandia (ASM aRticle)
description:
On today's episode of the podcast, we learn about Fordlandia in Brazil, a project in Brazil lead by Henry Ford in the race to grow his own rubber.

Link to the original article here: https://www.damninteresting.com/the-ruins-of-fordlandia/    

Link to support their work: https://www.damninteresting.com/damnload/
